about_the_game:
Movement:
• Dash: press a directional key + [shift] by default
• Boost: while moving forward and aiming up, press the dash key
• Slide: press [ctrl] by default

Weapons:
• Luger: starting in slot 1, accurate hipfire and no damage dropoff
• Gewehr 43: starting in slot 2, high damage with shorter maximum range
• StG 44: placed around each of the maps

Maps:
• Envy: capture 2 of the monuments within each of the 3 main temples to win points
• Will to Power: TDM, control the pickups in the central building
• Eternal Recurrence: TDM with health in nooks along edges of the map
detailed_description:
Multiplayer notes

You can host & join listen servers when launching the game using option 1 -- this will open a popup in your default browser to link your Epic Games account.

If you launch with option 2 to play offline against bots only, be sure to also change the in-game network setting to "offline" at the map selection screen.


About the Game

Movement:
• Dash: press a directional key + [shift] by default
• Boost: while moving forward and aiming up, press the dash key
• Slide: press [ctrl] by default

Weapons:
• Luger: starting in slot 1, accurate hipfire and no damage dropoff
• Gewehr 43: starting in slot 2, high damage with shorter maximum range
• StG 44: placed around each of the maps

Maps:
• Envy: capture 2 of the monuments within each of the 3 main temples to win points
• Will to Power: TDM, control the pickups in the central building
• Eternal Recurrence: TDM with health in nooks along edges of the map
ext_user_account_notice: Epic Games (only required if launching the game with multiplayer option)
name: Ubermensch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or compatible graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: First-person mod of the Unreal Engine Lyra starter project
